div.p: Group 2 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Goal|5.0.0 to Extensions for Using Data Elements from FHIR R5 in FHIR R4

tr.td: Element `Goal.continuous` has a context of Goal based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Goal`.
